titleStmt.title: The way of God with his people in these nations opened in a thanksgiving sermon, preached on the 5th of November, 1656, before the Right Honorable the High Court of Parliament / by Peter Sterry.
titleStmt.author: Sterry, Peter, 1613-1672.

titleStmt.title: The way of God with his people in these nations opened in a thanksgiving sermon, preached on the 5th of November, 1656, before the Right Honorable the High Court of Parliament / by Peter Sterry.
titleStmt.author: Sterry, Peter, 1613-1672.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A sermon preached before the right Honorable House of Parliament, on the 5. of November, 1656, being a thanksgiving day for the victory over the Spaniards West-Indie fleet.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
